db_version: PostgreSQL 17.5 on x86_64-pc-linux-musl, compiled by gcc (Alpine 14.2.0) 14.2.0, 64-bit

test_results.name: Join Simples - Serial
test_results.query: SELECT p.id, p.name, c.description FROM parent_serial p JOIN child_serial c ON p.id = c.parent_id WHERE p.value > 500 LIMIT 1000

test_results.name: Join Simples - UUID
test_results.query: SELECT p.id, p.name, c.description FROM parent_uuid p JOIN child_uuid c ON p.id = c.parent_id WHERE p.value > 500 LIMIT 1000

test_results.name: Join Complexo - Serial
test_results.query: SELECT p.name, COUNT(c.id) as child_count, AVG(p.value) as avg_value FROM parent_serial p LEFT JOIN child_serial c ON p.id = c.parent_id WHERE p.value BETWEEN 200 AND 800 GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY child_count DESC LIMIT 100

test_results.name: Join Complexo - UUID
test_results.query: SELECT p.name, COUNT(c.id) as child_count, AVG(p.value) as avg_value FROM parent_uuid p LEFT JOIN child_uuid c ON p.id = c.parent_id WHERE p.value BETWEEN 200 AND 800 GROUP BY p.name ORDER BY child_count DESC LIMIT 100

test_results.name: Múltiplos Joins - Serial
test_results.query: WITH active_children AS (SELECT parent_id, COUNT(*) as active_count FROM child_serial WHERE active = true GROUP BY parent_id) SELECT p.id, p.name, p.value, COUNT(c.id) as total_children, COALESCE(ac.active_count, 0) as active_children FROM parent_serial p LEFT JOIN child_serial c ON p.id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN active_children ac ON p.id = ac.parent_id WHERE p.value > 200 GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.value, ac.active_count ORDER BY p.value DESC LIMIT 100

test_results.name: Múltiplos Joins - UUID
test_results.query: WITH active_children AS (SELECT parent_id, COUNT(*) as active_count FROM child_uuid WHERE active = true GROUP BY parent_id) SELECT p.id, p.name, p.value, COUNT(c.id) as total_children, COALESCE(ac.active_count, 0) as active_children FROM parent_uuid p LEFT JOIN child_uuid c ON p.id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN active_children ac ON p.id = ac.parent_id WHERE p.value > 200 GROUP BY p.id, p.name, p.value, ac.active_count ORDER BY p.value DESC LIMIT 100
